title: Several Wounded in Shooting Near South Los Angeles
content:
LoudLabs
At least four people were injured in a shooting near South Los Angeles early Tuesday morning, police said.
The shooting was reported just before 1 a.m. near 56th Street and Naomi Avenue, according to the Los Angeles Police Department.
The four victims were transported to a hospital, one with serious injuries and the other three were in stable condition, police said.
The shooting was under investigation.
